channel.title: Help With New Server-Connecting
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape, I've been working on servers for a good two years now. I took breakk recently for a good five months because I got back into playing other people's RSPS'. Recently, I've been trying to make a new server and I've been having a problem. I got a new laptop for Christmas because my old computer with all my server stuff on it broke. So, I've been trying to make a new server and this is what happens when I try to connect. I've done some coding, such as adding some things to the source already so I'd be pretty sad if I fu--ed up the source somehow. I'm running windows 7, home edition, dual core i7 processors, and 8gb of RAM. I know that won't help but it's just so you get an idea of what I'm using. Here's the problem: I am trying to connect to the server with a webclient maker and it's not working. It's saying the server is offline. Here's what I did: I downloaded the port-forward tool from portforward.com and portforwared, I set an exception for 43594 in my firewall, and I ran the server. (Run.bat) Everytime I try to connect to it, it says offline. HELP ME!!!!
Thanks in advance, Chris.
PS: If problem is succefully fixed and I'm working good, there might be a reward :)

item.title: Help With New Server-Connecting
item.dc:creator: @cia_nick cia nick
item.description:
@cia_nick wrote:

Disable windows 7 fire wall or try a different source that’s %100 guaranteed to work if you did everything you said…

Read full topic

item.title: Help With New Server-Connecting
item.dc:creator: @iDoSkillzzz iDoSkillzzz
item.description:
@iDoSkillzzz wrote:

Hello Moparscape, I’ve been working on servers for a good two years now. I took breakk recently for a good five months because I got back into playing other people’s RSPS’. Recently, I’ve been trying to make a new server and I’ve been having a problem. I got a new laptop for Christmas because my old computer with all my server stuff on it broke. I’m running windows 7, home edition, dual core i7 processors, and 8gb of RAM. I know that won’t help but it’s just so you get an idea of what I’m using. Here’s the problem: I am trying to connect to the server with a webclient maker and it’s not working. It’s saying the server is offline. Thanks in advance, Chris.

PS: If problem is succefully fixed and I’m working good, there might be a reward
